2.2 #permalink Font Weights

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Font weight variations. Clash Display (headings) supports 200-700, Satoshi (body) supports 300-900.

Example
Clash Display (Headings):
Extralight (200)
Light (300)
Regular (400)
Medium (500)
Semibold (600)
Bold (700)
Satoshi (Body):
Light (300)
Regular (400)
Medium (500)
Bold (700)
Black (900)
Markup 
<div style="margin-bottom: 10px;"><strong>Clash Display (Headings):</strong></div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 200; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Extralight (200)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 300; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Light (300)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 400; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Regular (400)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 500; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Medium (500)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 600; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Semibold (600)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-heading); font-weight: 700; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 20px;">Bold (700)</div>
<div style="margin-bottom: 10px;"><strong>Satoshi (Body):</strong></div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 300; font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Light (300)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 400; font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Regular (400)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 500; font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Medium (500)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 700; font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Bold (700)</div>
<div style="font-family: var(--font-family-body); font-weight: 900; font-size: 18px;">Black (900)</div>
Source: src/assets/scss/base/_typography.scss, line 95
